title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: For auction are a few Genesis Series 3 "sets"There were a total of 100 sets of coins for this seriesThe 100 coins were divided into 50 sets of "shiny" and 50 sets of "matte"Each set consists of 4x coins: BTC, LTC, VIA, DASHAnd each coin is numbered as suchLOT 1: all 4x coins, shinyLOT 2: all 4x coins, matteLOT 3: BTC/VIA/DASH, matteLOT 4: BTC, matte // DASH, shinyLOT 5: VIA/DASH, shiny**Marks seen are on the capsules. Coins are in good condition****Coins numbers for these "sets" do not match, but do offer a good entry point for collecting this series.**STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0010MINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: AUGUST 24th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED
